summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json and does not show any changes to the Biodata (/biodata) page implementation. As a result, the requested removal of the instructor photo/portrait from the Biodata page is not evidenced as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove any instructor photo/portrait rendering from the public-facing Biodata page route (/biodata) so the page shows only the "Biodata" heading and the two sections ("Professional Summary" and "Core Competencies"), without any images.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend route/page/component files for /biodata are modified in the diff; only project metadata is changed, so there is no evidence that any or portrait/avatar rendering was removed from the Biodata page or that placeholders/broken images were addressed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (project_state.json projectStateVersion/feature listings) unrelated to removing the Biodata page photo.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about removing an image from the /biodata page and includes constraints about not changing UI component library or backend interfaces; modifying project_state.json is not requested as part of REQ-56 and does not contribute evidence of implementing the requested UI change.
